description: STRING No. 4 // From 2015-11-01 // By Jonas Kasper Jensen www.jonaskasperjensen.com // Size 110 cm x 140 cm // The Fountain of Youth is a mythical spring that restores the youth of anyone who drinks or bathes in its waters. Jensen made this series to create a fountain where he imagined the western culture could bath to renew itself.
materials: acrylic and spray paint on canvas
name: Fountain of youth I/IV
